Title: Northwest Passage
Genre: Adventure, Drama, History, Romance, War, Western
Director: King Vidor, Jack Conway, W.S. Van Dyke
Writer: Laurence Stallings (screenplay), Talbot Jennings (screenplay), Kenneth Roberts (based on the novel by)
Actors: Spencer Tracy, Robert Young, Walter Brennan, Ruth Hussey
Plot: Based on the Kenneth Roberts novel of the same name, this film tells the story of two friends who join Rogers' Rangers, as the legendary elite force engages the enemy during the French and Indian War. The film focuses on their famous raid at Fort St. Francis and their marches before and after the battle.
